| HistoryText             = Thirty years ago Doc Croc lead his gang in Battle against [[Britannia (Tanya) (Earth-616)|Britannia]]. Volcanna was defeated but The Sponge was able to surprise her and overpower her.{{r|Union Vol 1 4}}

After Britannia's death Doc Croc tracked down and forced [[Choir (Ruth) (Earth-616)|The Choir]] into his gang. He left Shifter to guard her home but he was killed by a former member of the gang - The Sponge.{{r|Union Vol 1 3}}

Doc Croc then led his gang in an attack on the [[Tower of London]] to steal the [[Empire Stone]] during which, they easily overpowered the remains of the Britannia Project. However, they were beaten to the stone by [[Steve Darwin (Earth-616)|Steve Darwin]].{{r|Union Vol 1 4}}

In their attempt to gain the stone Volcanna and Lady Shimmering Lights were knocked out. Doc Croc was arrested after Skreem rejoined the Britannia Project and was sent to prison.{{r|Union Vol 1 5}}
